MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH52 postcode area of Winchburgh. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to remove trees located near to the overhead line at Niddry Castle and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.55pm on Tuesday 20th October 2020.
